previousMentorSessions.title: Building a Career in Full Stack Development

previousMentorSessions.description: Focused on interview preparation strategies including DSA practice, problem-solving mindset, communication tips, and handling interview pressure.

previousMentorSessions.description: Explained backend fundamentals using Node.js and Express, including REST APIs, middleware concepts, and frontend-backend integration.

previousMentorSessions.description: Covered database fundamentals, schema design, CRUD operations, indexing, and best practices for scalable MongoDB applications.

previousMentorSessions.title: Resume-Worthy Projects

previousMentorSessions.description: A hands-on session covering Git basics, branching strategies, pull requests, conflict resolution, and real-world team workflows.

previousMentorSessions.title: DSA: Beginner to Intermediate
previousMentorSessions.description: Explained essential data structures and algorithms with problem-solving approaches, optimization tips, and coding practice guidance.

previousMentorSessions.title: Career Guidance for Final Year Students
previousMentorSessions.description: Mentor-led discussion on career planning, internships, certifications, skill selection, and placement preparation strategies.

previousMentorSessions.title: Soft Skills & Communication
previousMentorSessions.description: Focused on improving communication skills, professional behavior, confidence, teamwork, and presentation skills for engineers.
